content.query:
SELECT TOP (100) [SourceSystemID]
,[GlobalMovieID]
,[SourceSystemMovieID]
,[SouthridgeMovieID]
,[ActorID]
,[ActorName]
,[ActorGender]
,[Title]
,[Genre]
,[Rating]
,[RuntimeMinutes]
,[TheatricalReleaseYear]
,[PhysicalAvailabilityDate]
,[StreamingAvailabilityDate]
 FROM [ext].[Catalog]
 where actorname = 'Lisa Morris'
